sentences.en: Camus is considered to be one of the twentieth century's literary giants.
sentences.cn: 加缪被视为20世纪的文学巨匠之一.

sentences.en: For me, the July twentieth affair was in every way a calamity.
sentences.cn: 就我来说, 七月二十日事件完全是大祸临头.

sentences.en: Full unification took place only at the beginning of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 完全的统一只是在二十世纪开头才实现.

sentences.en: He came in twentieth.
sentences.cn: 他得了第二十名。

sentences.en: If you are twentieth, do you get a medal?
sentences.cn: 如果你第二十，你得到奖牌吗？

sentences.en: In many general respects it resembles many twentieth century schemes.
sentences.cn: 它在许多总的方面与二十世纪的许多系统相类似.

sentences.en: One twentieth of the total output was exported.
sentences.cn: 产量中有二十分之一出口.

sentences.en: Penicillin is arguably the greatest medical discovery of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 盘尼西林大概是二十世纪医学上最伟大的发现.

sentences.en: Picasso was born a phenomenon of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 毕加索生来就是二十世纪的一位非凡人物.

sentences.en: Some have called him the greatest entertainer of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 有人曾称他为20世纪最伟大的艺人。

sentences.en: The atomic bomb is the offspring of twentieth century physics.
sentences.cn: 原子弹是二十世纪物理学的产物.

sentences.en: The coal consumption has declined since the early years of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 自20世纪的早些年起,煤的消耗就下降.

sentences.en: The four and twentieth to Romamtiezer, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve.
sentences.cn: 第二十四是罗幔提以谢。 他和他儿子并弟兄共十二人。

sentences.en: The rogue male is not a twentieth-century phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 男性不安分守己并非20世纪特有的现象。

sentences.en: The space age dawned in the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 太空时代开始于二十世纪.

sentences.en: The twentieth century has thus brought city and country closer together.
sentences.cn: 二十世纪就这样把城市和乡村拉得更拢了.

sentences.en: This was how I stepped into my twentieth year.
sentences.cn: 我就是这样地跨进我的二十岁年纪。

sentences.en: Tomorrow is her twentieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 明天是她二十岁生日.

sentences.en: Tutti was always first in her class before, but has slipped since the last move down to twentieth out of fifty children.
sentences.cn: 图蒂从前在班上总是名列前茅，但打从上回搬家后，名次已掉到五十个学童当中的第二十名。

sentences.en: We live in the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在二十世纪.

sentences.en: When you know you will have a second, third, or twentieth release it is easy to just add scope to the product backlog. You know you will get to that feature someday.
sentences.cn: 当你得知你将有第二个、第三个甚至第二十个发布时，它也只是简单地增加产品需求列表的范围，你知道，通过这样做，假以时日就能实现这些特性。

words.tran_cn: 二十几岁；二十年代（1920年到1929年的时期）；一生中20至29岁的十年
第二十的；二十分之一的

trans.tran_cn: 第二十的，二十分之一的
二十分之一，（某月的）二十日

trans.tran_en: the one in a series that you count as number twenty
